text: The provisions of this subchapter shall not apply to:
historical:

See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.

See notes to § 31-3301.01.

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 31-3303.10

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Any group health benefit plan for any plan year if, on the first day of such plan year, such plan has less than 2 participants who are current employees; or
Any health benefit plan for any of the excepted benefits.
